title: Why We Write - 20 Acclaimed Authors on How and Why They Do
description:
Pages: 250 pages
ISBN: 0452298156
Published: 29 January 2013
Language: English
ASIN: B008H7KGPM



Twenty of America's bestselling authors share tricks, tips, and secrets of the successful writing life.

Anyone who's ever sat down to write a novel or even a story knows how exhilarating and heartbreaking writing can be. So what makes writers stick with it?
